Articles.Content: How can I use RCS thrusters to boost upwards? I have a little rocket and I have lots of thrusters and it only goes from side to side can someone tell me ow to do it! Also how can you stop with the wheels because KurtJmac stopped his plane by braking with wheels I don\'t know how can someone please tell me

Hi kacperrutka26

Turn on RCS thrusters with the R key.

You can thrust up with H

Down is N

Left and right is J and L while away and towards you are I and K

Also, to stop a craft using the wheels, press B for the brakes.

Hope this helps
Thank you that helped with stopping on the runway with a plane that I made and the rcs will be useful for landing on the Mun I guess. And again Thank you
You can brake with the B key when your plane is on the ground, that\'ll stop you rolling.
